alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Cumberland; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 11:48AM EST until December 20 at 4:50PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Androscoggin River At Rumford affecting Franklin, Oxford and Androscoggin Counties. Androscoggin River Near Auburn affecting Sagadahoc, Cumberland and Androscoggin Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Maine... Swift River At Roxbury affecting Oxford County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Androscoggin River near Auburn. * WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, In Lewiston, flooding begins near the intersection of River Road and Ferry Road as well as Switzerland Road near St. Peter`s Cemetery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight, then crest around 17.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
